subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species.
Anonyx litoralis Krøyer, 1845
, selected by Boeck, 1876 .

Remarks. Based on the morphology of gnathopod 1
Onisimus
and
Anonyx
are very similar.
Onisimus
retains the triturating molar characteristic of tryphosine amphipods while
Anonyx
has a derived setose tongue.
